oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Innovation Systems: From Diagnostics toward Operational Practices Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: R. Rajalahti
W. Janssen
E. Pehu
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Proceedings of a workshop dealing with issues around enhancing agricultural innovation and the impact and usefulness of ag R&D. It includes stakeholders analysis, different levels of case studies and specific innovation experiences and has policy and specific action recommendations.
